roleset.name: eastablish boundaries that define something

example.name: boundary marker
example.text: It has no fences; trees delimit its perimeter.

example.name: define example
example.text: Immigrants must delimit the meaning of thier new ethnic identities.
example.arg: the meaning of thier new ethnic identities.

example.name: Reason for both arg 0 and 1
example.text: He delimited the areas that measure force and density with colored blocks.
example.arg: the areas that measure force and density

roleset.note: DELIMIT-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from delimit.01-v)
